import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col,Image,ListGroup,Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product =products.find(p=>p._id ===match.params.id) return ( <> back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} ) } export default ProductScreen
